title: Test Engineer
job_function: Information Technology, Quality Assurance, and Engineering
description:
**Company Description:** 




  





 Marquistech is an integrated Telecom domain company offering business value through innovative and cost\\-effective service delivery models to customers worldwide. Marquistech provides services for Mobile Handset Application Development and Testing. Marquistech has expanded its development and test service to global markets. The companyâ€™s field test and application development division has been successfully delivering CDMA and GSM field test services and new application development since 2005\\. Field testing is carried out across Asia Pacific (APAC), Middle East Africa (MEA), South\\-East Asia Pacific (SEAP) \\& Middle\\-East North Africa (MENA), Latin America, Saudi, Dubai, South Korea, UK, Australia.
 



  





**URL:
 *www.marquistech.co
 
 m***




  





**Location: Navi Mumbai (India)** 




  





**Job Description:**




  




1. Voice service solutioning based on IMS (4G / 5G)



 2\\. Analysing and resolving IoT related issues, resolving with end\\-to\\-end tracking.
 



 3\\. Identify the IP Centrex service process automation areas and contribute in the associated activities.
 



 4\\. Identify the SIP Trunk service process automation areas and contribute in the associated activities.
 



 5\\. Ensure the security related compliance of all the products/solutions with Infosec team.
 



 6\\. Aim for zero human touch and work towards full automation
 



 7\\. Support and Monitor implementation and smooth deployment of Voice services in pan India using various topology
 



 8\\. LAB testing \\& QA clearance for any new requirement
 



  





**Skills and Competencies** 




  





 1\\. Good Analytical Skills
 



 2\\. Presentation Skill
 



 3\\. Communication Skills
 



 4\\. Problem Solving
 



 5\\. Managing change and Performance
 



 6\\. Empowering Others
 



 7\\. Good Team Player
 



  





**Thanks \\& Regards** 




**Rajesh yadav**

title: Executive - Markets - National - CBS - C&I - Digital Products & Solutions - Bangalore
description:
Requisition Id: 1671132
   

  

 As a global leader in assurance, tax, transaction and advisory services, we hire and develop the most passionate people in their field to help build a better working world. This starts with a culture that believes in giving you the training, opportunities and creative freedom. At EY, we don't just focus on who you are now, but who you can become. We believe that itâ€™s your career and â€˜Itâ€™s yours to buildâ€™ which means potential here is limitless and we'll provide you with motivating and fulfilling experiences throughout your career to help you on the path to becoming your best professional self.
   

  

**The opportunity** 
 : Executive\\-National\\-Markets\\-CBS \\- C\\&I \\- Digital Products \\& Solutions \\- Bangalore
   

  

**National :**
 National comprises of sector agnostic teams working across industries for a well rounded experience.
   

  

**CBS \\- C\\&I \\- Digital Products \\& Solutions :**
 Our Markets team focuses on providing account teams with the support they need to help drive revenue growth. Our "account\\-centric" approach to serving clients starts with understanding their business and providing tools and enablers to provide consistency on how we identify and align our services and solutions to our clients' most pressing issues. We deliver services through one or more of our four global service lines: Assurance, Consulting, Strategy and Transactions and Tax. Our Markets team comprises of Business Development and Brand Media \\& Communication (BMC).
   

  

 By adopting EY methodologies, executing on guidance, and leveraging tools and strategic programs, we bring the necessary rigor to our engagements. And by accessing our latest EY insights, solutions and client conversation tools, we have more meaningful conversations with our clients to help shape their thinking and generate additional value creation.
   

  

**Your Key Responsibilities**
**Technical Excellence**
* Looking for smart engineers with 2\\-6 years of exprience building leading edge products in the enterprise sftware or consumer software space. They should preferably be full stack engineers in one of the following stacks: 1\\. Java Ful Stack 2\\. Python Full Stack 3\\. .Net full stack


**Skills And Attributes**
**To qualify for the role you must have**
**Qualification**
* Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
* Master of Computer Applications


**Experience**
* Full Stack Development (4\\+ years)
* Backend Development (3\\+ years)
* Frontend Development (2\\+ years)


**What We Look For**
 People with the ability to work in a collaborative manner to provide services across multiple client departments while following the commercial and legal requirements. You will need a practical approach to solving issues and complex problems with the ability to deliver insightful and practical solutions. We look for people who are agile, curious, mindful, and able to sustain positive energy, while being adaptable and creative in their approach.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 Fuelled by the brilliance of our people, EY has emerged as the strongest brand and the most attractive employer in our field, with market\\-leading growth over competitors. Our people work side\\-by\\-side with market\\-leading entrepreneurs, game\\-changers, disruptors, and visionaries. As an organization, we are investing more time, technology, and money than ever before in skills and learning for our people. At EY, you will have a personalized Career Journey and also the chance to tap into the resources of our career frameworks to better know about your roles, skills, and opportunities.
   

  

 EY is equally committed to being an inclusive employer, and we strive to achieve the right balance for our peopleâ€”enabling us to deliver excellent client service while allowing our people to build their careers as well as focus on their wellbeing.
   

  

 If you can confidently demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.
   

  

 Join us in shaping the future with confidence. Apply Now

title: ServiceNow Developer
description:
**Primary Title:** 
 ServiceNow Developer
   

  

**About The Opportunity**
 A role in the Enterprise IT Services sector focused on Digital Workflow and IT Service Management (ITSM) implementations. You will join a delivery team working on enterprise\\-scale ServiceNow projectsâ€”designing, building and maintaining workflow automation, integrations, and user\\-facing Service Portal experiences for large Indian and global customers. This is an on\\-site position based in India.
   

  

 Role \\& Responsibilities
   

  

* Design, develop and configure ServiceNow applications using server\\- and client\\-side scripting (GlideRecord, GlideAjax, Business Rules, Client Scripts).
* Build and maintain Service Portal widgets, custom UI components, and ensure responsive, accessible front\\-end experiences.
* Integrate ServiceNow with external systems using REST/SOAP, IntegrationHub spokes, and MID Server implementations.
* Implement and maintain CMDB data flows, transform maps, discovery patterns, imports and data reconciliation processes.
* Manage application life cycle: update sets, scoped applications, security (ACLs), performance tuning and release deployments.
* Troubleshoot production issues, provide timely fixes, produce technical documentation and collaborate with cross\\-functional stakeholders.


**Skills \\& Qualifications**
**Must\\-Have (technical skills)**
* ServiceNow Platform
* JavaScript
* GlideRecord
* REST APIs
* Service Portal
* Update Sets


**Preferred (differentiators)**
* IntegrationHub
* MID Server
* CMDB


**Qualifications**
* Proven experience delivering end\\-to\\-end ServiceNow development in enterprise projects (implementation, customization, and support).
* ServiceNow certifications (e.g., Certified System Administrator) are a strong plus.
* Willingness to work on\\-site in India and support release windows / production troubleshooting as needed.


 Benefits \\& Culture Highlights
   

  

* Work on complex, enterprise\\-grade ServiceNow implementations and integrations.
* Opportunities for certification support, technical training and career progression within ServiceNow delivery.
* Collaborative delivery teams with a focus on engineering quality, knowledge sharing and measurable business impact.


 To apply, ensure your resume highlights ServiceNow projects, specific modules worked on, integration experience and any ServiceNow certifications. This on\\-site India role suits developers eager to own technical delivery for high\\-impact ITSM and workflow programs.
   

  

 Skills: servicenow,cmdb,javascript,itsm,ldap,soap

title: Python Intern
description:
**Company Description**

 PPStack is a global EdTech pioneer committed to transforming the landscape of education by bridging the gap between academic learning and industry requirements. Our mission revolves around empowering students, professionals, and organizations with future\\-ready skills through AI\\-powered solutions and innovative teaching methodologies. We offer a broad spectrum of services, from e\\-learning platforms, corporate training, and career coaching to digital branding and technology consulting. Trusted worldwide, PPStack is dedicated to delivering impactful, smart, and fast learning experiences that drive digital empowerment and career advancements.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time remote Python Intern role. The Python Intern will develop, test, and deploy Python\\-based projects, including assisting in the creation of algorithms and data analysis. Responsibilities include debugging Python code, collaborating with the team on project development, and researching and implementing best practices for coding and development. This role also involves contributing to the development of innovative solutions for EdTech tools and technologies.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficient in Python programming with a strong understanding of core concepts and problem\\-solving skills.
* Experience or basic knowledge in data analysis, algorithms, and debugging methods.
* Familiarity with web frameworks such as Django or Flask, and version control systems like Git is advantageous.
* Strong research and learning abilities to quickly grasp new technologies, tools, and frameworks.
* Effective communication skills and the ability to work independently in a remote team environment.
* Enrollment in or recent completion of a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field is preferred.
* Prior project experience or coursework involving Python development would be considered a plus.
* An enthusiasm for technology and an eagerness to contribute to the future of EdTech.

title: NodeJS Full stack SDE II
description:
About the job
 



  





 CodeChavo is a global digital transformation solutions provider based in Noida and Bengaluru. The company partners with clients from design to operation, embedding innovation and agility into organizations. CodeChavo works closely with top technology companies to make a real impact through transformation and helps companies outsource their digital projects and build quality tech teams.
 



  





 Role Description
 



 This is a full\\-time role for a Nodejs Developer at Codechavo Global. The role is on\\-site and located in Mumbai. The NodejsStack Developer will be responsible for the development of all server\\-side logic, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the frontend. The main tasks include designing and developing user\\-facing platforms, developing databases and services for website functionality, and integrating with third\\-party services and APIs. Supporting team members, participating in code reviews, and keeping up\\-to\\-date with the latest industry trends are also key responsibilities.
 



  





 Role: SDE II/III
 



 Experience: 3\\-6 and 5\\-8years
 



 Location: Bengaluru (WFO)
 



  





 Qualifications
 


* Strong proficiency in MongoDB, Express.js,Node.js, NestJS
* Extensive experience of RESTful APIs and web services
* Experience in Messaging queues like Kafka, Rabbit MQ
* Proficiency in database design, optimization and management
* Knowledge of version control tools such as Git
* Ability to write efficient, secure, and scalable code
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail
* Good communication and teamwork skills
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field
* Experience in Agile development methodologies is a plus

title: Staff Software Engineer, Backend (Platform - Finance Engineering)
description:
Ready to be pushed beyond what you think youâ€™re capable of?
 



  





 At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. Itâ€™s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform â€” and with it, the future global financial system.
 



  





 To achieve our mission, weâ€™re seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the companyâ€™s hardest problems.
 



  





 Our work culture is intense and isnâ€™t for everyone. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, thereâ€™s no better place to be.
 



 While many roles at Coinbase are remote\\-first, we are not remote\\-only. In\\-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company\\-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.
 



  





 The mission of the Platform Product Group engineers is to build a trusted, scalable and compliant platform to operate with speed, efficiency and quality. Our teams build and maintain the platforms critical to the existence of Coinbase. There are many teams that make up this group which include Product Foundations (i.e. Identity, Payment, Risk, Proofing \\& Regulatory, Finhub), Machine Learning, Customer Experience, and Infrastructure.
 



  





 Finance Engineering team is building Coinbaseâ€™s financial nervous system: a unified, automated reconciliation and payments\\-data platform that Finance relies on to close the books with precision, speed, and auditâ€‘grade controls. In 2026, weâ€™re making daily, transactionâ€‘level cash reconciliation the standard across our businesses, shipping a unified recon interface that spans cash and crypto, standardizing external bank and processor data with enforceable quality contracts, and compressing finance reviews to a single clean iteration.
 



  





 As a Staff Software Engineer at Coinbase, you will join our team to build out the next generation of crypto\\-forward products and features. You will solve unique, large scale, highly complex technical problems, bridging the constraints posed by web\\-scale applications and blockchain technology. You will help build the next generation of systems to make cryptocurrency accessible to everyone across the globe, operating real\\-time applications with high frequency, low latency updates, and managing the most secure, dockerized infrastructure running in the cloud.
 



  





**What youâ€™ll be doing** 
 :
 


* Build new services to meet critical product and business needs using Golang.
* Design scalable systems to solve novel problems with modern cloud technology and industry best practices.
* Articulate a long term vision for maintaining and scaling our backend systems and the teams running them.
* Work with engineers, designers, product managers and senior leadership to turn our product and technical vision into a tangible roadmap every quarter.
* Write high quality, well tested code to meet the needs of your customers. Debugging extremely difficult technical problems, and making systems and products both work better and are easier to deploy, own, operate and diagnose.
* Review all feature designs within your product area and across the company for cross\\-cutting projects. Be an owner of the security, safety, scale, operational integrity, and architectural clarity of these designs.
* Streamline processes in accounting, tax, treasury, and finance operations.
* Reduce reliance on manual tools by implementing AI/ML\\-driven automation



  





  





**What we look for in you:** 



* You have at least 8\\+ years of experience in software engineering.
* Youâ€™ve designed, built, scaled and maintained production services, and know how to compose a service oriented architecture.
* You write high quality, well tested code to meet the needs of your customers.
* Youâ€™re passionate about building an open financial system that brings the world together.
* You possess strong technical skills for system design and coding
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, and a bias toward open, transparent cultural practices.








  





**Nice to haves** 
 :
 


* You have gone through a rapid growth in your company (from startup to mid\\-size).
* Experience with growth experiments or A/B testing frameworks.
* You have experience with Blockchain technology (such as Bitcoin, Ethereum etc..)
* Youâ€™ve worked with Golang, Docker, Rails, Postgres, MongoDB or DynamoDB.



  





 Job Id : GPBE06IN
 



  





 \\*Answers to crypto\\-related questions may be used to evaluate your onchain experience.
 



  





 \\#LI\\-Remote
 



  





 Please be advised that each candidate may submit a maximum of four applications within any 30\\-day period. We encourage you to carefully evaluate how your skills and interests align with Coinbase's roles before applying.
 



  





  





**Commitment to Equal Opportunity** 




 Coinbase is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, creed, gender, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, sex, gender expression or identity, sexual orientation or any other basis protected by applicable law. Coinbase will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with applicable federal, state and local law. For US applicants, you may view the Employee Rights and the Know Your Rights notices by clicking on their corresponding links. Additionally, Coinbase participates in the E\\-Verify program in certain locations, as required by law.
 



  





 Coinbase is also committed to providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities. If you need a reasonable accommodation because of a disability for any part of the employment process, please contact us at accommodations\\[at]coinbase.com to let us know the nature of your request and your contact information. For quick access to screen reading technology compatible with this site click here to download a free compatible screen reader (free step by step tutorial can be found here).
 



  





  





**Global Data Privacy Notice for Job Candidates and Applicants** 




 Depending on your location, the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) may regulate the way we manage the data of job applicants. Our full notice outlining how data will be processed as part of the application procedure for applicable locations is available here. By submitting your application, you are agreeing to our use and processing of your data as required.
 



  





  





**AI Disclosure** 




*For select roles, Coinbase is piloting an AI tool based on machine learning technologies to conduct initial screening interviews to qualified applicants. The tool simulates realistic interview scenarios and engages in dynamic conversation. A human recruiter will review your interview responses, provided in the form of a voice recording and/or transcript, to assess them against the qualifications and characteristics outlined in the job description.* 




  





*For select roles, Coinbase is also piloting an AI interview intelligence platform to transcribe and summarize interview notes, allowing our interviewers to fully focus on you as the candidate.* 




  





***The above pilots are for testing purposes and Coinbase will not use AI to make decisions impacting employment***
*. To request a reasonable accommodation due to disability, please contact accommodations\\[at]coinbase.com*

We are looking for Founding Engineers to join our core team and help build a clinically relevant medical device and digital health platform from the ground up.
 



 This is a hands\\-on, ownership\\-driven role at the intersection of hardware, software, and healthcare, where you will work closely with doctors, founders, and real patientsâ€”not just specs and simulations.
 



  




**Key Responsibilities** 
**Product \\& Engineering (Core)** 
* Design, develop, and iterate on
 **medical device hardware and/or software systems**
* Work on
 **device\\-to\\-app / device\\-to\\-cloud integration**
* Translate clinical requirements into
 **engineering specifications**
* Build, test, debug, and improve
 **prototypes used in real clinical settings**
* Collaborate closely with clinicians to refine usability and accuracy



  




**Software Responsibilities (Depending on skillset)** 
* Develop and maintain
 **mobile apps / web dashboards / backend services**
* Work on
 **data pipelines, APIs, device data processing**
* Integrate firmware output with software systems
* Support analytics, AI, or decision\\-support features (if applicable)



**Tech stack may include:** 




 Android / iOS / Web, Python, Node.js, Flutter, React, REST APIs, cloud services, data analytics
 



  




**Hardware Responsibilities (Depending on skillset)** 
* Work on
 **embedded systems, sensors, electronics**
* Support
 **PCB design, prototyping, testing, and validation**
* Interface hardware with firmware and software teams
* Assist in preparing hardware for
 **clinical trials and regulatory pathways**



**Tech areas may include:** 




 Embedded C/C\\+\\+, microcontrollers, sensors, PCB tools, hardware testing \\& validation
 



  




**Who Should Apply** 

 You are a good fit if you:
 


* Have
 **strong fundamentals** 
 in software or hardware engineering (or both)
* Are excited about
 **building real products** 
 , not just maintaining legacy systems
* Are comfortable working in an
 **early\\-stage, fast\\-changing startup**
* Want
 **ownership, responsibility, and long\\-term growth**
* Are motivated by
 **healthcare impact and patient outcomes**



  




**Preferred Background (Flexible)** 
* B.Tech / M.Tech / equivalent experience in Software / Electronics etc
* Experience with
 **startups, prototypes, or real\\-world deployments** 
 preferred
* Exposure to
 **medical devices, health\\-tech, embedded systems, or IoT** 
 is a plus
* Fresh graduates with strong projects and learning mindset are welcome



  




**How to Apply** 

 Send your profile / GitHub / portfolio to: support
 **@respirithealth.com**

description:
**About the Role**

The ideal candidate will have deep expertise in React, modern JavaScript, Server\\-Driven UI (SDUI), and GraphQL\\-based micro\\-frontend architectures.
 



 This role requires strong technical ownership, the ability to work independently end\\-to\\-end, and experience mentoring junior frontend engineers.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  




* Design, develop, and maintain scalable, modular, and high\\-quality frontend applications using React and JavaScript.
* Implement Server\\-Driven UI (SDUI) patterns to enable dynamic UI rendering.
* Build and integrate GraphQL APIs using Apollo GraphQL.
* Design and implement Micro Frontend (MFE) architectures using GraphQL MFE and Webpack.
* Lead frontend architecture decisions and provide technical guidance to the team.
* Mentor junior frontend engineers through code reviews, design discussions, and best practices.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code; ensure high code quality standards.

* Collaborate closely with backend, UX, QA, and DevOps teams to deliver end\\-to\\-end solutions.
* Independently design, code, implement, review, and deploy frontend solutions.



  





**Primary Skills \\& Qualifications** 




  




* 7\\+ years of professional experience in frontend/web development.
* Strong hands\\-on experience with React and modern JavaScript (ES6\\+).
* Experience with Server\\-Driven UI (SDUI) implementations.
* Strong expertise in GraphQL and Apollo GraphQL.
* Hands\\-on experience with Micro Frontends (MFE), including GraphQL MFE and Webpack.
* Proficiency in HTML5 and CSS3\\.
* Experience leading frontend initiatives and mentoring junior engineers.
* Testing \\& Quality (Mandatory)
* Experience with test automation tools such as Selenium.
* Strong experience with Unit \\& E2E testing frameworks: Jest, Karma, Jasmine, Protractor, Cucumber
* Cloud \\& DevOps Exposure
* Exposure to Cloud platforms: AWS / Azure / GCP.
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and frontend build/deployment processes.



  





**Secondary / Nice\\-to\\-Have Skills** 




  




* Experience with Angular.
* Exposure to performance optimization and accessibility standards.
* Knowledge of modern frontend security best practices.



  





**About the Workplace:** 




  





 Our client offers a comprehensive range of unique employee benefits, including parental insurance, meal allowances, childrenâ€™s education support, workâ€“life balance initiatives, learning and development programs, and more. An opportunity to lead and shape frontend architecture in high\\-impact projects and work with modern UI patterns, GraphQL, and microfrontend architecture. Exposure to work in a collaborative and growth\\-oriented engineering
 



 culture and an opportunity to mentor and build high\\-performing frontend teams.

title: Development Engineer 3 (Golang)
description:
Comcast brings together the best in media and technology. We drive innovation to create the world's best entertainment and online experiences. As a Fortune 50 leader, we set the pace in a variety of innovative and fascinating businesses and create career opportunities across a wide range of locations and disciplines. We are at the forefront of change and move at an amazing pace, thanks to our remarkable people, who bring cutting\\-edge products and services to life for millions of customers every day. If you share in our passion for teamwork, our vision to revolutionize industries and our goal to lead the future in media and technology, we want you to fast\\-forward your career at Comcast.
   

  

**Job Summary**
 Comcast's Technology, Product \\& Experience organization works at the intersection of media and technology. Our innovative teams are continually developing and delivering products that transform the customer experience. We work every day to make a positive impact through innovation in the pursuit of building amazing products that are enjoyable, easy to use and accessible across all platforms both on Broadband and Video products. The team also develops and supports our evolving network architecture, including next\\-generation consumer systems and technologies, infrastructure and engineering, network integration and management tools, and technical standards. In most cases, Comcast prefers to have employees on\\-site collaborating unless the team has been designated as virtual due to the nature of their work. Comcast India Engineering Center Chennai One SEZ, Phase 2 (5th floor) North Block, Phase 2, Module 7\\&8, Pallavaram \\- Thoraipakkam 200 Feet Road, Thoraipakkam, Chennai\\-600 097\\. Visit us at: www.comcastcareers.com/india Overview This position is responsible for managing and maintaining a large infrastructure.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
**Job Description**
* Provision software into multiple cloud environments using infrastructure as code frameworks.
* Perform software installation, configuration changes, and upgrades via automated tooling and configuration management.
* Configure supporting services of applications not limited to GSLB (Global Server Load Balancer), load balancer (haproxy), monitoring, and security tools.
* Perform application, system, and network troubleshooting to provide problem resolution of infrastructure faults and customer usage issues.
* Produce RCA (Root Cause Analysis) findings that focus on recommendations to learn from and avoid problem recurrence.
* Provides input to Engineering and vendors on defects and required enhancements.
* Proactively identify and automate repetitive tasks.
* Provide regular review and updates to documentation of an application including infrastructure diagrams, procedures for common tasks, and incident mitigation.


**Technical Skills Required**
**Key Skills : Golang Developer, Microservices Architecture, Any cloud**
* Expertise in configuring and managing Linux systems.
* Proven experience using scripting languages to automate tasks. Python, shell, and Go are preferred.
* Working knowledge of configuration and infrastructure management tools. Terraform and Ansible preferred.
* Experience in large compute environments utilizing a mix of virtual are physical compute resources from multiple providers. AWS (Amazon Web Services) and Openstack experience a plus.
* Understanding of modern version control systems. Git is primarily used.
* Proficient using modern tools for system observability. Experience identifying additional metrics to better monitor applications. Hands on knowledge of Prometheus, Nagios/OP5, and Splunk are beneficial.


**Other Requirements**
* Be proficient in verbal and written communication.
* Demonstrate proven experience in a demanding environment.
* Must be reliable and accountable for work assigned. Experience with tracking tools like Jira preferred.
* Familiar with common methodologies of working like SRE, DevOps, Agile and Scrum.
* Well versed in common incident, problem, and change management practices.
* Demonstrate strong reverse engineering skills when diagnosing unfamiliar systems and applications.
* At scale there are anomalies that are hard to detect, so the ability to think analytically, rather than procedurally, to uncloak problems is paramount.
* When standard operating procedures don't have expected results, you will need to be able to be able to improvise fully.


**Education And Experience**
* Bachelors Degree in Engineering or Computer Science or equivalent experience.
* Generally requires 2\\+ years of related experience.


 \\#CIECTN25
   

  

 Comcast is an equal opportunity workplace. We will consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, genetic information, or any other basis protected by applicable law.
   

  

 Base pay is one part of the Total Rewards that Comcast provides to compensate and recognize employees for their work. Most sales positions are eligible for a Commission under the terms of an applicable plan, while most non\\-sales positions are eligible for a Bonus. Additionally, Comcast provides best\\-in\\-class Benefits to eligible employees. We believe that benefits should connect you to the support you need when it matters most, and should help you care for those who matter most. Thatâ€™s why we provide an array of options, expert guidance and always\\-on tools, that are personalized to meet the needs of your reality â€“ to help support you physically, financially and emotionally through the big milestones and in your everyday life. Please visit the compensation and benefits summary on our careers site for more details.
   

  

**Education**
 Bachelor's Degree
   

  

 While possessing the stated degree is preferred, Comcast also may consider applicants who hold some combination of coursework and experience, or who have extensive related professional experience.
   

  

**Relevant Work Experience**
 5\\-7 Years

Develops and maintains code that validates front\\-end, middleware and database systems, using the latest tools and common programming languages. Provides input into various software development lifecycle stages. Partners with software engineers to write efficient automation code using coding standards and best practices. Executes automated code and creates comprehensive execution reports for team. Repairs complex broken automation scripts and performs peer reviews of automation codebase. Has in\\-depth experience, knowledge and skills in own discipline. Usually determines own work priorities. Acts as resource and mentor for colleagues with less experience.
   

  

**Job Description**
**Core Responsibilities**
* Write automated test code, using the same standards as a Software Engineer, that allows for repeatable, reliable testing solutions to test the wide functionality of products and software, maintaining automation codebase in a version control system (GIT, SVN). May include creating simple SQL queries for validation of databases and / or writing SOAP and RESTful API automated scripts.
* Create automated testing documentation, including Test Plans, Test Summary Reports etc.
* Execute automated test scripts and presents results to team.
* Analyze broken test cases and diagnose and repair to working order.
* Perform code reviews of automation scripts and front\\-end codebases. Diagnose and repair simple bugs within production code.
* Serve as a guide and mentor for junior\\-level engineers. Provides technical leadership and consultation with regards to practices, procedures and techniques.
* Consistent exercise of independent judgment and discretion in matters of significance.
* Regular, consistent and punctual attendance. Must be able to work nights and weekends, variable schedule(s) as necessary .
* Other duties and responsibilities as assigned.


**Employees At All Levels Are Expected To**
* Understand our Operating Principles; make them the guidelines for how you do your job.
* Own the customer experience \\- think and act in ways that put our customers first, give them seamless digital options at every touchpoint, and make them promoters of our products and services.
* Know your stuff \\- be enthusiastic learners, users and advocates of our game\\-changing technology, products and services, especially our digital tools and experiences.
* Win as a team \\- make big things happen by working together and being open to new ideas.
* Be an active part of the Net Promoter System \\- a way of working that brings more employee and customer feedback into the company \\- by joining huddles, making call backs and helping us elevate opportunities to do better for our customers.
* Drive results and growth.
* Respect and promote inclusion \\& diversity.
* Do what's right for each other, our customers, investors and our communities.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**About The Role**
 We are seeking an experienced and highly motivated Sr DevOps Engineer to drive faster releases, scalability, and reliability across our engineering and production environments. The ideal candidate will have 10\\+ years of experience in IT, with a strong background in DevOps, infrastructure automation, cloud computing, CI/CD, and team leadership.
   

  

 As a Sr Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in modernizing our infrastructure, streamlining our deployment pipelines, and enhancing our DevSecOps posture. You will lead a team of DevOps engineers and work closely with development, QA, security, and IT teams to implement best practices and deliver world\\-class DevOps capabilities.
   

  

 The ideal candidate will have hands\\-on experience with Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, ARM, and possess a strong background in team and stakeholder management. This role requires a strategic thinker who is outcome\\-oriented and capable of driving deployment automation and one\\-click deployment solutions.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Lead the DevOps team, mentoring, and fostering a culture of innovation and ownership.
* Design, implement, and manage robust, scalable, and secure CI/CD pipelines to support product development and release cycles.
* Drive the infrastructure as code (IaC) adoption using tools like Terraform.
* Spearhead DevSecOps initiatives by integrating security controls and checks in CI/CD pipelines.
* Oversee and optimize cloud infrastructure (Azure), ensuring cost\\-efficiency, scalability, and availability.
* Define and enforce DevOps best practices, including environment provisioning, configuration management, monitoring, and incident management.
* Collaborate with software engineering and QA teams to enable faster and reliable deployments.
* Set and track metrics related to build, deployment, availability, reliability (SLAs/SLOs), and team efficiency.
* Own and evolve the incident response and root cause analysis processes to reduce MTTR and improve platform resilience.
* Manage vendor relationships, licensing, and third\\-party integrations related to DevOps tooling.
* Continuously evaluate and adopt emerging tools, technologies, and methodologies to improve team capabilities and system performance
* Design and implement Azure Architecture solutions.
* Creating POCs for solutions in .Net/Python.


**Required Qualifications**
* 10\\+ years of overall experience with at least 5\\+ years in implementing scalable DevOps pipelines and processes.
* Proven experience in managing cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, or GCP) at scale.
* Strong expertise in CI/CD tools like GitHub Actions, Jenkins, Azure DevOps, or equivalent.
* Hands\\-on experience with IaC tools like Terraform, Ansible, Helm, etc.
* Solid understanding of containerization and orchestration platforms such as Docker and Kubernetes.
* Knowledge of monitoring, alerting, and observability tools such as Log Analytics.
* Experience in integrating security practices into the DevOps lifecycle (DevSecOps).
* Demonstrated ability to lead teams, manage roadmaps, and align DevOps initiatives with business and product goals.
* Excellent communication, collaboration, and stakeholder management skills.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills with a passion for automation and performance optimization.
* Strong understanding of Azure Architecture.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Certifications in Azure, Kubernetes or relevant DevOps tools.


 Working in an evolving healthcare setting, we use our shared expertise to deliver innovative solutions. Our fast\\-growing team has opportunities to learn and grow through rewarding interactions, collaboration and the freedom to explore professional interests.
   

  

 Our associates are given valuable opportunities to contribute, to innovate and create meaningful work that makes an impact in the communities we serve around the world. We also offer a culture of excellence that drives customer success and improves patient care. We believe in giving back to the community and offer a competitive benefits package. To learn more, visit: r1rcm.com
   

  

 Visit us on Facebook
